plot: A surreal romantic comedy set in Glasgow featuring a musical Grim Reaper, a reincarnated Jim Morrison and strange shadowy government agents.
title: Just Around the Corner
plot_es: A surreal romantic comedy set in Glasgow featuring a musical Grim Reaper, a reincarnated Jim Morrison and strange shadowy government agents.
plot_en: A surreal romantic comedy set in Glasgow featuring a musical Grim Reaper, a reincarnated Jim Morrison and strange shadowy government agents.
